gitTestSource.description: URL or ssh for test repository.

testingPlatform.description: Image used for testing. Currently available: [java, python]

project.description: Default is second from the end in url. https://gitlab.cs.ttu.ee/iti0102-2019/ex.git > project = iti0102-2019. Specify project, if its not second from end

dockerExtra.description: No defaults. You can add (stylecheck) or something. It is sent to smaller tester. Look the possibilities from the small tester repository for more details.

systemExtra.description: No defaults. You can add (noMail, noTesterFiles, noStd, noFeedback)
